physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Tenderness over the left posterolateral chest wall and old bruising of the left side of the abdomen.
Healing fractures with callus formation in several ribs corresponding to the FDG-PET abnormalities.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: FDG uptake was noted in fractures 17 days post-injury but no uptake was observed 8 weeks after the fracture.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Inability to bear weight and worsening lower back pain.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: FDG-PET scan performed 8 weeks post-fall showed normal findings.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Two rib fractures were found during CT scans related to the chest pain and subsequent cardiac event.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: FDG-PET showed low-grade activity in rib fractures corresponding to previous injuries.
